easymesh.get_start_tips: Connect EasyMesh devices to form a mesh network with seamless Wi-Fi coverage and centralized management.
easymesh.controller_tips: Connects to the Internet and manages all Agent devices.
easymesh.controller_mode_tips: Add Agents to expand Wi‑Fi coverage and centrally manage all Agents.
easymesh.agent_mode_one_tips: Join an existing EasyMesh network to expand the Controller's Wi-Fi coverage.
easymesh.agent_mode_two_tips: Once connected, this device will automatically get an IP address from the Controller. To access this web interface again, use the assigned IP address.
easymesh.reset_mode_one_tips: Are you sure you want to reset the EasyMesh mode?
easymesh.reset_mode_two_tips: All current EasyMesh settings will be cleared and you will need to reconfigure them.
easymesh.scan_nearby_agents_tips: Scan for nearby mesh agents that are powered on and ready to join, so you can add them to your mesh network.
easymesh.add_with_pairing_code_tips: Get a pairing code on this controller, then enter it on the agent to join this controller’s mesh network.
easymesh.all_select_no_firmware_tips: All selected devices are running the latest firmware.
easymesh.firmware_updating_tips: Firmware upgrade in progress. Please wait for it to complete.
easymesh.all_select_reset_firmware_tips: Are you sure you want to reset the selected device(s) to factory settings?
easymesh.reboot_device_tips: Are you sure you want to reboot this device?
easymesh.remove_device_tips: Are you sure you want to remove this device?
easymesh.enter_pairing_code_label: Enter the pairing code from the Controller.
easymesh.join_by_scan_tips: Add this agent from the Controller's interface. No action is needed on this page.
easymesh.join_by_wired_connection_tips: Connect the Controller's LAN port to this device's LAN port using an Ethernet cable. You can then access the Controller's interface to view the mesh topology and manage this device.
easymesh.once_connected_tips: Once connected, this device will automatically get an IP address from the Controller.To access this interface again, use the new IP address.
easymesh.for_centralized_management_tips: For centralized management, manage this device through the Controller's interface.
easymesh.make_sure_the_pairing_code_tips: Make sure the pairing code is correct, or try moving this device closer to the Controller.
easymesh.exit_mesh_network_one_tips: Are you sure you want to exit the mesh network?
easymesh.exit_mesh_network_two_tips: This device will disconnect from the Controller and you will need to rejoin a network to use EasyMesh again.
easymesh.agents_upgrade_tips: Firmware upgrade in progress. Do not power off or operate the device. It will reboot automatically once the upgrade is complete.
easymesh.device_wait_upgrade_tips: The device should be back online in 2~3 minutes. Check the firmware version in the EasyMesh Devices List.
easymesh.do_not_power_off_tips: Do not power off or operate the node during this process.
easymesh.you_can_check_node_tips: You can check the firmware version in the node information page once complete.
easymesh.prepare_your_devices_one_tips: 1. Make sure your devices support EasyMesh. You may need to update the firmware for earlier models.
easymesh.prepare_your_devices_two_tips: 2. Power on the devices near the Controller.
easymesh.ensure_easyMesh_supported_tips: Ensure EasyMesh is supported and enabled, and move the device closer to the main router if needed.
easymesh.add_device_success_tips: This device has been added successfully.
easymesh.add_device_operation_one_tips: For optimal wireless coverage, place the device about halfway between the Controller and the Wi-Fi dead zone.
easymesh.add_device_operation_two_tips: The new device may take a few moments to appear in the topology.
easymesh.add_device_operation_three_tips: To add more devices, click {scan} again.
easymesh.make_sure_device_powered_tips: Make sure the device you want to add is powered on and within range of the Controller.{reScan}
easymesh.select_add_the_devices_tips: Found the following devices. Select one to add to the EasyMesh network.
easymesh.please_enter_pairing_code_tips: Please enter this pairing code in agent router.
easymesh.pairing_code_expire_tips: This pairing code will expire in {time}.
easymesh.unlock_device_screen_tips: Unlock the device screen to continue.
